props.inline: Display slider next to the icon. VMenu won't be displayed on click. Recomended to pair with **sliderProps** to configure slider width.
props.direction: Switch between horizontal and vertical slider.
props.label: Text to display in tooltip and passed to `aria-label`.
props.menuProps: Props passed to VMenu containing volume slider. Useful to adjust **location** and control menu alignment
props.sliderProps: Selected props to customize volume slider.
